name: JemimaTheMagicCat
0:
”Alexa, ask Jemima The Magic Cat to set the name of the witch to Emily”
”Alexa, ask Jemima The Magic Cat to play chapter one”
”Alexa, ask Jemima The Magic Cat for help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jemima the magic cat
des:
This first story, called 'Jemima and the Magic Spell Book', has two chapters. To listen to the story as written just say; 'Alexa, Open Jemima The Magic Cat'. and then, when you are asked what you want to do, say something like... 'Play Chapter One', or 'Read Chapter two'.

Alternatively, you can start by saying something like 'Alexa, ask Jemima The Magic Cat to read chapter two.

If, however, you wish to change the name of the witch; or the name of Jemima's best friend; or the geographical region used in the story the the easiest way to do this is to open the skill by saying... 'Alexa, open Jemima the Magic Cat' 

Then, when you are asked what you want to do, say something like ... 
 Set the name of the witch to Susan

 or Set the name of the best friend to Harry

 or Set the region to New Hampshire

Then when you play a chapter your chosen names and region will appear in the story.

When you want to stop just say Stop or Finish.

By the way,:Several more 'Jemima The Magic Cat' stories are in the pipeline so this story book will grow with time. The number of characters, and other items, that can be changed is also destined to grow.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
